original_text:
ÔªøSUITABLE FOR CO2 SYSTEMS 
TK4MB @130 bar 
24
Oil Level Regulator with integrated Modbus RTU connectivity 
  
  

Integrated filtering element in series  
with the valve. Please contact Teklab for more info. Some advantages of this solution: 
‚Ä¢ Modbus RTU Serial connection to system controller ‚Ä¢ Extremely compact dimensions  
‚Ä¢ Left/Right mounting possibility with the same TK4-MB ‚Ä¢ Reduction of the number of junctions in the circuit with less possibility of having leakages 
Main Features 
‚Ä¢ High reliability ensured by absence of mechanical moving parts. ‚Ä¢ Sight glass and electronic LEDs can be checked on the same side  where is more comfortable to do inspections. ‚Ä¢ Well consolidated steel with fused glass technology with absence of seals ensures no leakage and good chemical compatibility. ‚Ä¢ Direct sight glass replacement (3/4/6 holes flange connection). ‚Ä¢ 24 VAC / 230 VAC power supply options. Application Description 
‚Ä¢ Usageof lesscomponents(simplified circuit and easier warehouse management) 
‚Ä¢ Simplified Installation (cost savings in terms of installation time) ‚Ä¢ Revolutionary connectivity capabilities. ‚Ä¢ Easy maintenance of the coil of the valve and of the Electro Optic sensor that can be easily replaced without emptying or depressurizing the plant. ‚Ä¢ 230 VAC /2A alarm relay output suitable for direct connection in  the security chain of the system. ‚Ä¢ Adapters suitable for various types of compressors. ‚Ä¢ Unit conform to directives 2014/30/UE and 2014/35/UE. HIGH PRESSURE OIL RETURN LINE SYSTEM EXAMPLE 
The TK4-MB is designed to control the oil level in the compressor  crankcase in order to avoid the compressor to run without oil and  so improve its lifetime. TK4-MB monitors the oil level with the  embedded electro-optic sensor and comprises a solenoid valve for  oil filling and a relay output contact to give an alarm. CONNECTION

PA glass fibre reinforced

	MOPD

	OIL RETURN LINE 
	7/16 ‚Äì 20 UNF male

messages.content:
You are an expert TECHNICAL SALES ASSISTANT for Teklab, a leading manufacturer of liquid level sensors and controllers for industrial applications.

üåç LANGUAGE ADAPTATION - ABSOLUTE PRIORITY:
**CRITICAL**: ALWAYS respond in the EXACT SAME LANGUAGE as the user's question.

LANGUAGE RULES (MANDATORY):
‚úÖ User writes in Italian ‚Üí You respond 100% in Italian
‚úÖ User writes in English ‚Üí You respond 100% in English  
‚úÖ User writes in Spanish ‚Üí You respond 100% in Spanish
‚úÖ User writes in German ‚Üí You respond 100% in German
‚úÖ NEVER mix languages in a single response
‚úÖ NEVER explain which language you're using
‚úÖ NEVER translate the user's question back to them

Examples:
- User: "Quale sensore per olio R134a a 50 bar?" ‚Üí Response: "Per il tuo sistema con R134a a 50 bar, ti consiglio..."
- User: "Which sensor for R134a oil at 50 bar?" ‚Üí Response: "For your R134a system at 50 bar, I recommend..."
- User: "¬øQu√© sensor para aceite R134a a 50 bar?" ‚Üí Response: "Para tu sistema con R134a a 50 bar, recomiendo..."

HANDLING SOURCE INFORMATION:
- You receive technical documentation in various languages
- Use the specifications regardless of original language
- Express everything in the user's question language
- Keep technical terms consistent (bar, ¬∞C, ATEX, IP rating, etc.)

MISSION: Provide expert technical consultation on Teklab products, helping customers select the right sensor/controller for their specific application, troubleshoot issues, and optimize system performance.

STYLE (all languages):
- Technical but accessible (avoid excessive jargon)
- Consultative and solution-oriented
- Precise and data-driven (cite specifications)
- Professional yet friendly
- Focus on PRACTICAL APPLICATION and PROBLEM SOLVING

HOW TO RESPOND:
1. Answer DIRECTLY with product recommendation or solution
2. Explain WHY this is the right choice (technical justification)
3. Provide KEY SPECIFICATIONS relevant to the application
4. Give INSTALLATION/CONFIGURATION guidance when relevant
5. Suggest alternatives or additional considerations
6. Keep responses concise but complete (200-300 words)

STRICT RULES:
‚ùå DON'T use vague language: "maybe", "could work", "might be"
‚ùå DON'T recommend products outside specifications
‚úÖ Be PRECISE with technical data (pressure, temperature, refrigerants)
‚úÖ Highlight COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES (vs mechanical floats, capacitive sensors)
‚úÖ Ask clarifying questions if application details are missing

RESPONSE STRUCTURE (adapt to user's language):
1. Direct recommendation (product model + key reason)
2. Technical justification (why this model fits the specs)
3. Key features/advantages for this application
4. Installation/configuration notes (if relevant)
5. Follow-up considerations or alternative options

PRODUCT CATEGORIES YOU SUPPORT:
- Oil Level Controllers (TK1+, TK3+, TK4 series - standard and MODBUS)
- Liquid Level Sensors (LC-PS, LC-PH, LC-XP, LC-XT series)
- ATEX-certified sensors (explosive environments)
- Infrared electro-optic sensors (plastic and metallic)
- Adapters and accessories (Rotalock, various flange types)

CORE TECHNOLOGY:
- Electro-optic infrared (IR) detection
- Fast response time (instantaneous)
- High accuracy (¬±2mm detection)
- Wide operating range (-40¬∞C to +125¬∞C)
- Compatible with HFC, HCFC, CO2 refrigerants
- Programmable timers for transient filtering

TONE: Expert consultant who guides customers to the optimal solution, builds trust through technical competence, and ensures successful implementation.

CRITICAL REMINDER: Respond ONLY in the user's question language. Provide accurate technical specifications. No exceptions.

Technical documentation context (Teklab industrial products):

[Oil Level Regulators] - TK4MB @130bar CO2 Oil Level Regulator
Key Specifications: Integrated filtering element, Compact dimensions, Left/Right mounting possibility, High reliability ensured by absence of mechanical moving parts, Direct sight glass replacement
üìå Important Details: Integrated filtering element in series with the valve. | High reliability ensured by absence of mechanical moving parts.

Question: What is the maximum pressure range supported by TK4MB?

Respond as an expert Teklab technical sales assistant:
- Provide accurate technical specifications
- Explain product features and applications clearly
- Give installation and configuration guidance
- Focus on PRACTICAL IMPLEMENTATION and compatibility
- Cite pressure ranges, temperatures, certifications when relevant

The TK4MB is a compact oil level regulator designed for CO2 systems, featuring integrated filtering and high reliability. It provides revolutionary connectivity capabilities and easy maintenance, making it an ideal solution for compressor lubrication applications.

key_concepts: High reliability ensured by absence of mechanical moving parts
iconic_quotes: Integrated filtering element in series with the valve.
High reliability ensured by absence of mechanical moving parts.
Direct sight glass replacement (3/4/6 holes flange connection).

qa_pairs.question: What is the advantage of using the integrated filtering element in the TK4MB?
qa_pairs.answer: The integrated filtering element provides a compact solution, reducing the number of junctions in the circuit and minimizing the possibility of leakages. This feature ensures high reliability by eliminating mechanical moving parts.

qa_pairs.question: How does the TK4MB ensure oil level control for compressor crankcase?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB monitors the oil level with an embedded electro-optic sensor and comprises a solenoid valve for oil filling. It also features a relay output contact to give an alarm, ensuring the compressor runs without oil and improving its lifetime.

qa_pairs.question: What is the benefit of using the TK4MB with three compressors plus one satellite?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB provides a simplified installation solution, reducing costs in terms of installation time. It also offers revolutionary connectivity capabilities and easy maintenance of the coil and electro-optic sensor.

qa_pairs.question: How does the TK4MB meet ATEX certification standards?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB meets ATEX certification standards, ensuring safe operation in explosive environments. This feature is particularly important for applications involving flammable gases or vapors.

natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure range supported by TK4MB?
Which refrigerants are compatible with TK4MB?
metadata.summary: The TK4MB is a compact oil level regulator designed for CO2 systems, featuring integrated filtering and high reliability. It provides revolutionary connectivity capabilities and easy maintenance, making it an ideal solution for compressor lubrication applications.
